comments.author: angela
comments.body:
you are right... since it seems not to be used currently with jcr2spi nor with any of the implementations i am in favor of that change.

concerns/objections by anybody?

comments.author: angela
comments.body:
no objections. assuming lazy consensus.

trunk: completed at revision 651626

description: I propose to remove the method getName() from org.apache.jackrabbit.spi.ItemInfo since it is redundant. The name is always the last element of the path which is available via the getPath() method.
summary: Remove ItemInfo.getName() since it is redundant
